channel.title: Erlang on SAURABH KUKADE
channel.description: Recent content in Erlang on SAURABH KUKADE

item.title: Erlang is not just a language, it is a philosophy
item.description: “Science is what we understand well enough to explain to a computer. Art is everything else we do.” — Donald Knuth Recently I was having this conversation with my colleague that why Erlang has good support for concurrency and why it should be use for building distributed systems. I would like to share my findings on this topic in this article. This article is just a high level overview of philosophy of Erlang hence it contains no code example.
